title: DOROTHY’S DREAM.
content: THIS is the queer little fairy dream That came to Dorothy Brown: “I was lost,” she said, “in the deep blue sea, A thousand fathoms down; There were branching corals and waving trees, And water-maids, good and fair, Who fed the fishes from pearly dishes, And gave to the least a share. There were schools of fishes, but never a book; There was sunlight without a sun; There were ways to roam, but not any home, And mothers—there were none!”

book.title: A Little Colored Boy and Other Stories
book.description: 简介： I think it more likely that God put an angels voice in Neddys throat to give us a taste of heavenly music, said grandma, looking up from the apples she was paring....
